text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Kirwee | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Minor urban area | image_skyline = De Renzie Brett memorial in Kirwee.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = De Renzie Brett memorial in Kirwee | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = New Zealand | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_type2 = Territorial authority | subdivision_name1 = Canterbury Region | subdivision_name2 = Selwyn District | subdivision_type3 = Ward | subdivision_name3 = Malvern | established_title = | established_date = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 157 | elevation_ft = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 3.68 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 966 | population_as_of = 2018 Census | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = New Zealand Standard Time | utc_offset1 = +12 | timezone1_DST = New Zealand Daylight Time | utc_offset1_DST = +13 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 7571 | area_code = 03 | area_code_type = | website = | footnotes = | image_dot_map = | dot_mapsize = | dot_map_base_alt = | dot_map_alt = | dot_map_caption = | dot_x = |dot_y = }} Kirwee is a town in the Selwyn District, New Zealand. It is situated west of Christchurch and north of Darfield on State Highway 73. It has a primary school and the historic pub burnt down on 25 December 2019. == References == Category:Towns in Canterbury Region Category:Selwyn District
